sentences.en: Could you identify your umbrella among a hundred others.
sentences.cn: 你能从100把雨伞中认出你的那一把吗?

sentences.en: Does coincidence come under the umbrella of the paranormal?
sentences.cn: 巧合属于超自然现象吗？

sentences.en: Harry held an umbrella over Dawn.

sentences.cn: 她的伞被风吹得翻转了。

sentences.en: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.cn: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

sentences.en: It looks like rain, you'd better take an umbrella with you.
sentences.cn: 要下雨了, 你还是带把伞吧.

sentences.en: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.cn: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.en: It was so windy my umbrella turned inside out.
sentences.cn: 风很大,把我的伞吹翻了.

sentences.en: It was very sensible of you to bring your umbrella.
She jabbed me in the arm with her umbrella.
She opens her umbrella, and walks up River Street.
sentences.cn: 她撑开伞，沿着河街向前走。

sentences.en: The man with the umbrella turned the corner again.
sentences.cn: 拿伞的人又拐进了拐角处。

sentences.en: The man with the umbrella will be the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 拿着雨伞的那个人准是首相.

sentences.en: Umbrella and raincoats are what people need in rainy days.
sentences.cn: 伞和雨衣都是下雨天人们要用的.

sentences.en: Within the umbrella term "dementia" there are many different kinds of disease.
sentences.cn: “痴呆”这一统称里包括多种不同的疾病。

phrases.tran_cn: n. （美）遮阳伞（海滨或花园用的）

trans.tran_cn: 雨伞，〈比喻〉保护物，[军]空中掩护幕，总括
trans.tran_en: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.
an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.
